Package main.java.game.model

Class CardGameModel

java.lang.Object
main.java.game.model.CardGameModel
public class CardGameModel extends Object
The model class for the card game.

    • initDrawStack

      public void initDrawStack(int drawSize)
      Initializes the draw stack of the game.
      Parameters:
      drawSize - The size of the draw stack.

    • drawCard

      public CardModel drawCard()
      Draw a random card from the draw stack. If only one card remains, moves all cards from discard to draw stack except the top one.
      Returns:
      The card drawn.

    • discardCard

      public void discardCard(CardModel card)
      Discard a card to the discard stack.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to discard.

    • getTopDiscard

      Returns:
      The top card of the discard stack.

      Returns:

      public int getDiscardStackSize()

    • isDrawStackEmpty

      public boolean isDrawStackEmpty()
      Check if the draw stack is empty.
      Returns:
      True if the draw stack is empty, false otherwise.

    • isDiscardStackEmpty

      public boolean isDiscardStackEmpty()
      Check if the discard stack is empty.
      Returns:
      True if the discard stack is empty, false otherwise.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns:
      the number of the orginal card game

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the game by moving all cards from the discard stack back to the draw stack. The discard stack is emptied, and all its cards are added to the draw stack in the order they were discarded. This method is typically used to reinitialize the draw stack when it runs out of cards.

    • addDrawStack

      public void addDrawStack(CardModel card)
      Adds a single card to the draw stack. This method allows a card to be manually added to the draw stack.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be added to the draw stack. It cannot be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the provided card is null.
